title._content: Family portrait at double wedding ceremony of the Heimann and Rosenfelder families

description._content: Description: Rosenfelder Family Picture: left to right, small girl sitting in front, Rosa Rosenthal; lady sitting behind her, Hedwig Rosenthal; man behind her, Joseph Rosenthal; tall man in rear, Adolf Rosenfelder; next to him, Ludwig Rosenfelder; lady in front of him, Fanny Rosenfelder; bridal couples, Bertha Rosenfelder, David Heimann, Selma Heimann, Nathan Rosenfelder; standing in rear, Selma Adler; next to her, Moses Adler; sitting in front, Therese Rosenfelder; man sitting next to her, Moses Rosenfelder; standing in rear, tall, Lina Rosenfelder; next to her, Moritz Steiner; in front of Moritz to the right, Betty Steiner; standing in rear on right, Max Rosenfelder; young boy at right, Max Steiner Creator/Photographer: Hohn, Eugen Object Origin: Unknown Medium: Black and white photographic print Date: 17 August 1909 Repository: Leo Baeck Institute Parent Collection: Karl L. Heiman Collection Call Number: AR 10032 Rights Information: No known copyright restrictions; may be subject to third party rights. For more copyright information, click here. Find more information about this image and others at CJH Archives and Library Catalog.
